references.paper_title: A generative approach for wikipedia-scale visual entity recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel methodology to curate a high-quality dataset for web-scale visual entity recognition, which is the central focus of the current work.

references.paper_title: Open-domain visual entity recognition: Towards recognizing millions of wikipedia entities
references.reason: This paper introduces the OVEN benchmark, a key component used for evaluating performance in this work.

references.paper_title: PaLI: A jointly-scaled multilingual language-image model
references.reason: This paper introduces the PaLI model, which is used as a baseline and for comparison of performance in this work.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the CLIP model, a foundational model used in various aspects of this work, including the visual encoder.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LAION-5B dataset, which is used as a comparison dataset for validating the approach proposed in this work.
